name: Linux Virtual Hard Disk
summary: Disk image file that serves as a virtual hard disk for Linux operating systems, such as Ubuntu, Kubuntu, Xubuntu, Edubuntu, and UbuntuStudio; can be mounted and viewed by the operating system as an actual hard disk; can be used to run multiple variations of Linux without needing to repartition the hard drive.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

linux.display_name: Recognized by the Linux operating system
